---
title: "Wargames.my 2015 - Slice of Life (Misc)"
tags:
  - wargamesmy2016
  - writeup
  - misc
---

The challenge site returns a HTTP response containing an SVG. The HTTP response
is reversed.

## Solution

Connect to the site and you will get this in response:

```
-----
>gvs/<
>g/<
>/ "1:yticapo-ekorts;retim:niojenil-ekorts;ttub:pacenil-ekorts;xp1:htdiw-ekorts;enon:ekorts;oreznon:elur-llif;1:yticapo-llif;000000#:llif"=elyts

KO 002 1.1/PTTH
````

There are some clues how this data has been transformed `KO 002 1.1/PTTH` is
reversed and at the bottom. A proper HTTP response would have this at the top.

So we can easily write our script to:

1. Reverse the order of a line from right to left.
2. Reverse the order of lines.

```python
#!/usr/bin/python

data = file("index.html").read()
data = data.split("\n")
result = ""
for i in data:
    temp = i[::-1]
    result = temp + "\n" + result
print result
```

In action:


We have our .svg file assembled (and converted to PNG):

![Converted to png]({{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/assets/images/wargamesmy2015/slice.png){: .align-center}
*The SVG image containing the flag*
{: .text-center}

Flag: **xyL**
